TopicTitle: Revelations of the Kraken (Chapter 44: Falling Down)

Articles.Content:
1 hour ago, Thedrelle said:

Such a sad ending to a Kerb who tried. another good chapter. 

 

Remember too though he was also sorta responsible for the extinction of an entire group of people. Well meaning but also a bit.... killy.
bibble

15 hours ago, Raptor42 said:

PS﻿: How long should﻿ Revelations be?

If it keeps up like this about 3 more years.  Must write harder. 

 

13 hours ago, qzgy said:

I﻿ feel spoiled though, two chapters in about as many days? This is.... Not normal! usually its a good month. or more. I'm not complaining though about the increa﻿sed rate.﻿

Things are moving better.  It won’t quite be such a quick turnaround on the next, but I’m aiming for two weeks. 

 

11 hours ago, qzgy said:

Remember too though he was also sorta responsible for the extinction of an entire group of people. Well meaning but also a bit.... killy.

And here he’s become one of my most interesting characters.  Is he a good guy or a bad guy after all? Time will tell... or will it?

8 hours ago, 0111narwhalz said:

bibble

2 minutes ago, CatastrophicFailure said:

T﻿hings are moving better.  It won’t quite be such a quick turnaround on the next, but I’m aiming for two weeks. 

That sounds.. pretty reasonable. I'll be waiting

11 minutes ago, CatastrophicFailure said:

If it keeps up like this about 3 more years.  Must write harder. 

Thats quite a bit of dedication. Dont burn out though. We'd all like to see this finished.

12 hours ago, qzgy said:

Thats﻿ quite a b﻿it of dedication. Dont burn out though. We'd all like to see this finished.﻿

I’m hoping it won’t be nearly that bad.  I need to see it finished, or it’ll drive me batty. Er. I was a bit shocked when I realized I’m already a year into it.

On 8/10/2018 at 2:05 AM, CatastrophicFailure said:

but I’m aiming for two weeks. 

BIt early but uh....

Moar? Or Moar SoonTM?

Wait, just trying to get this straight. This was what I got from the chapter

1. Kommissar was a good-guy!?!!?! (Or at least one of those neutral grey characters with good purpose but wrong actions)

2. Edgar is the Krakensbane!? I thought Valentina held that awesome title?

3. The Kraken was a prison warden for hell!?!!?!? And now Hell is about to break lose?

So, those points aside, for the most important point of all.

On 8/9/2018 at 9:47 AM, CatastrophicFailure said:

“IIIIIIII AAAAM NOOOOOOOT JEAAAAAALOUS!!!!!1!1!1!11!”

In other words, obviously jealous. 

Happy Explosions!

@CatastrophicFailure May be able to correct anything or add more but this is what I know/understand

1 hour ago, Alpha 360 said:

1. Kommissar was a good-guy!?!!?! (Or at least one of those neutral grey characters with good purpose but wrong actions)

WELLLLLL depending on how you look at it, he did commit genocide (See Whispers) however, he was aware and I guess possibly attempting to help get rid of the Kraken.

1 hour ago, Alpha 360 said:

2. Edgars is the Krakensbane!? I thought Valentina held that awesome title?

Nope, he always held that title. Val had the title of Shadowscourge. Or pick any of the following (Quoted from Whispers)

Quote

I am the Daughter of the Morning, the Firstborn of the Light. I am the Sword of the Broken. I am the Shield of the Bowed. I am Advocate, I am Councilor. I am Friend. I am the Voice of Justice, the Herald of Truth. Gadfly to the Wicked, Thorn to the Corrupt. I am the Beacon of the Last Day. I am the Final Cry. I am Shin-Breaker, Fork-Kicker, Eye-Spitter! I am the Scion of Vladimir. I am the Prodigy of Elena. I am Marath'inde Damane, the One Who May Not Be Leashed. I am Tenbish, I am the Shadowscourge

1 hour ago, Alpha 360 said:

3. The Kraken was a prison warden for hell!?!!?!? And now Hell is about to break lose?

*mouth opening and closing in mild defeat*

Maybe? The way its described is that Edgas defeated the guard to something worse. I personally got that we have yet to see the full force of the kraken, and this might have just been some weaker manifestation, but I'm not the author, I just stick stuff in PDFs.

1 hour ago, Alpha 360 said:

In other words, obviously jealous. 

NO TOTALLY NOT AT ALL. /s
